Ability.Name: -- OFENSIVE SPELLS --
Ability.Lua:
--Change to AOE and back if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 0.3 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if setAoE then setAoE = false print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ASingle target") else setAoE = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652AArea of Effect") end end
--Global Variables Offensive _,_,_,_,_,_,_,_,notI = UnitCastingInfo("target") Rage = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
--Function Special Targets function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb", "Murozond" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
--Function ImmuneTarget function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
--Stop IF: if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) or IsSpellInRange("Maul", "target") == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- DEFENSIVE SPELLS --
Ability.Lua:
-- Global Variables Defensive myHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") Stance = GetShapeshiftForm("player") MoW = UnitBuff("player", "Mark of the Wild") BoK = UnitBuff("player", "Blessing of Kings")
-- Stop IF: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or Stance == 5 or SpellIsTargeting() or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Bear Form
Ability.Lua: if Stance ~= 1 then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(1) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end

Ability.Name: Barskin
Ability.Lua: if myHP <= 90 then return true end

Ability.Name: Survival Instincts
Ability.Lua: if myHP <= 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: Mark of the Wild
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return false else if MoW == nil and BoK == nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: Skull Bash
Ability.Lua: if notI ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Bash
Ability.Lua:
Local skull = GetSpellCooldown(80964)
if notI ~= nil and skull ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Demoralizing Roar
Ability.Lua:
local vindication = UnitDebuffID("target", 26017) local demoshout = UnitDebuffID("target", 1160) local curseofweakness = UnitDebuffID("target", 702) local demoroar = UnitDebuffID("target", 99)
if CheckInteractDistance("target", 3) == nil then return false end
if vindication == nil and demoshout == nil and curseofweakness == nil and demoroar == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Feral Charge (Bear)
Ability.Lua: if CheckInteractDistance("target", 3) == nil and UnitName("target") ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Enrage
Ability.Lua: if Rage < 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Pulverize
Ability.Lua: local _, _, _, LacerateCount = UnitDebuff("target", "Lacerate") if LacerateCount ~= nil then if LacerateCount == 3 then return true end else return false; end

Ability.Name: Swipe
Ability.Lua: if setAoE then return true end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua:
local ber = UnitBuff("player", "Pulverize") local tHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if ber ~= nil and tHP >= 10 then return true end
